name: Spooky Sphere (Muaaz Ali, Afaq Ahmad)
description:
Spooky Sphere is a game made for 2-Buttons Game Jam.

The idea of the game is to control the character and take it to the end goal. However, in order to do so, you can only use two buttons given on the UI (or the left and right arrow key). These arrows will change their directions, in a unique way in each difficulty level.

The game was designed as a puzzle to sharpen the minds and test quick thinking and reflexes of a player.
